message:
HackHands is now part of the Pluralsight.
HackHands (Instantly connect with a qualified expert and get hands-on help 24/7 ,Sessions start at $1 per minute, with the first five minutes risk free  . many Pluralsight authors will be there too )

Pluralsight now includes ( Pluralsight ,  Digital-Tutors, Code School ,HackHands and a cooperation with sqlskills.com )
story: Mohamed Hashem shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Pluralsight + HackHands: Enhancing online learning with live mentoring
caption: blog.pluralsight.com
description: Whether you’re learning something new or tackling a problem for the first time, it’s inevitable you’ll need some help along the way. That's why we've acquired HackHands, which connects people with qualified mentors in minutes.
